head.title: Hackers Congress Paralelní Polis 2016
head.description: HCPP 2016 will take place in Paralelní Polis. Presentations will be held on the first floor (premises of Paper Hub transformed into a conference room) and on the second floor - our normal conference room called Institute of Cryptoanarchy. During the days of the Congress, Polis will be open from 9:00 AM until... some early morning hour.

rawBody: ![HCPP 2016](./assets/index.png)

During the days of the Congress, Polis will be open from 9:00 AM until... some early morning hour. --- ![HCPP 2016](./assets/index.png)
